mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store(business_Number, store_pwd, representative, store_name, store_zip_code, store_address1, store_address2, business_type, business_start_date, store_tel, store_join_date, state, auth) VALUES (#{businessNumber}, #{storePwd}, #{representative}, #{storeName}, #{storeZipCode}, #{storeAddress1}, #{storeAddress2}, #{businessType}, #{businessStartDate}, #{storeTel}, now(), "WATING", "STORE")
mapper.update: UPDATE store SET representative = #{representative}, store_pwd = #{storePwd}, store_zip_code = #{storeZipCode}, store_address1 = #{storeAddress1}, store_address2 = #{storeAddress2}, store_tel = #{storeTel} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT business_Number, representative, store_name, store_zip_code, store_address1, store_address2, business_type, business_start_date, store_tel, store_join_date, state, auth FROM store WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, business_Number, representative, store_name, business_type, store_zip_code, store_address1, store_address2, business_type, business_start_date, store_tel, store_join_date FROM store WHERE state = "USE" AND auth = "STORE"
SELECT id, business_number, representative, store_name, business_type, store_zip_code, store_address1, store_address2, business_start_date, store_tel, state FROM store WHERE state = 'WAITING'

SELECT t.payment_date AS payment_date, t.approval_number AS approval_number, i.card_number AS card_number, t.installment AS installment, t.card_charge AS card_charge FROM transaction AS t INNER JOIN card_issued AS i ON t.card_issued_id = i.id WHERE t.store_id = #{storeId} AND YEAR(t.payment_date) = #{targetYear} AND MONTH(t.payment_date) = #{targetMonth}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment(payer, target_id, target_year, target_month, payment, payment_date, payment_state) VALUES ("STORE", #{storeId}, #{targetYear}, #{targetMonth}, #{payment}, now(), "FULL")
